attributes.action: Not allow Scottish independence without a vote throughout the Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the governments current stance that, with the consent of the majority of Scotland's people, they may become an independent nation, however such a decision should be made only with the consent of the majority of the UK, as it would not just affect the 5 million people of Scotland, but all of the 60 million people in the UK.
